title: Par de Ideotas
overview: In order to become "independent" from their famous father, Vadhir and José Eduardo Derbez decide to open a pop-up bar in Mexico City.This adventure will test them in ways they never imagined as they strive to prove to their father, Eugenio Derbez, that they can succeed with their new business venture. Their mothers, Silvana Prince (Vadhir's mother) and Victoria Ruffo (José Eduardo's mother), will be by their side, offering support as they receive the help from an array of VIP guests.
